data.text: @MarkAlanMarks But don't you see you're just doing the opposite of the leftist sheeps? You're believing everything that is pro-Putin which is no better. I suggest you engage in critical thinking, remain neutral and be critical and look for flaws in ALL information on social media.
@PortsmouthBTC @PercyThrower4 @MarkAlanMarks @DaveAtherton20 No. I was there. RAF, RAF strike command, and Allied Command Europe in Mons.

@tweetz_girl I'm struggling to fathom out precisely what you're trying to say. Your narrative is rather inarticulate. You come across as rather confued. Conspiracy theories? Basements? Have you've been brainwashed? Maybe you believe in David Icke's reptilian theory.

@Somersetboy3 @PercyThrower4 @MarkAlanMarks @DaveAtherton20 I don't suppose there'd be anything too blatant, but are you suggesting all state business is done in the open light of day? There's no more fighting in the shadows so to speak? No morally questionable decisions made on the quiet? That'd be a first time in human history. And daft

@MarkAlanMarks @PortsmouthBTC @PercyThrower4 @DaveAtherton20 But you talked of lies from NATO?

Do you mean the USA?

@Somersetboy3 @PortsmouthBTC @PercyThrower4 @DaveAtherton20 NATO has 30 member states. Two of them being America and Britain. It's no secret that America has hegemony over NATO. Do I really need to go on about the lies that have come from Washington and the defense ministries of America for decades? It would take me a week.

@PortsmouthBTC @PercyThrower4 @MarkAlanMarks @DaveAtherton20 Do you have any evidence of that?

Not in any briefings, planning, doctrine conferences I have been in.

@MarkAlanMarks No I’m assuming your in the basement hunting down all these conspiracy theories and getting banned from twitter for them. I’m glad your not a fan and we will part ways you have your opinion and I’ll have mine. Ta ta for now

@Somersetboy3 @PercyThrower4 @MarkAlanMarks @DaveAtherton20 I don't believe that personally. What am I expected to believe? That our state have gone from being some clever bastards who will do anything to win to some cuddly fluffy human rights respecting group of hippies? Nah when it comes down to it our state will behave just like others
